column1: Kata Robata////We had three sushi rolls
column3: the king crab and the spicy tuna. All good
column4: but not great. Really enjoyed the Texan. Ended the meal with the lobster Mac and cheese. Which was also pretty good. I have no complaints about anything
column5: just don't really think the quality and amount of food was worth the price. Maybe I didn't appreciate the quality of the fish
column7: but I've gotten more food of the same or better quality for much cheaper.
